alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:21PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, central Aiken and west central Orangeburg Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Ellenton, or 7 miles east of Aiken Mall, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Barnwell, Denmark, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Barnwell State Park, Hilda, Elko, Windsor and Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg
